org.micromanager.api

Interface ImageCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TaggedImageStorage

    public interface ImageCache
extends TaggedImageStorage
    An interface, implemented by MMImageCache. See also TaggedImageStorage. The ImageCache is expected to use another TaggedImageStorage for actual storage. It contains various helper functions for interrogating the stored data set.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.micromanager.api.TaggedImageStorage

        storagePluginName

    • Method Detail

      • addImageCacheListener

        void addImageCacheListener(ImageCacheListener l)
        Adds the provided cache listener. The listener will be notified whenever an image is added or finished() has been called.

      • getChangingKeys

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getChangingKeys()
        Get a list of keys that are not identical for every TaggedImage. The Set returns changes over time as new images are loaded or received.

      • getComment

        java.lang.String getComment()
        Gets the overall comment string for this data set.

      • getImageCacheListeners

        ImageCacheListener[] getImageCacheListeners()
        Gets a list of image cache listeners.

      • getLastImageTags

        org.json.JSONObject getLastImageTags()
        Returns the image tags for the last received image.

      • removeImageCacheListener

        void removeImageCacheListener(ImageCacheListener l)
        Removes an imageCacheListener so that it will no longer be notified of relevant events.

      • saveAs

        void saveAs(TaggedImageStorage newImageFileManager)
        Save a new copy of a TaggedImage data set, stored in a TaggedImageStorage object. The new data set will be used by this cache in the future.

      • saveAs

        void saveAs(TaggedImageStorage newImageFileManager,
            boolean moveToNewStorage)
        Save a new copy of a TaggedImage data set, stored in a TaggedImageStorage object. The data set will be use by this cache in the future if moveToNewStorage is true.

      • getIsOpen

        boolean getIsOpen()
        Return true if the ImageCache is still valid, false otherwise.

      • setComment

        void setComment(java.lang.String text)
        Set the data set's comment string for this image cache.

      • setImageComment

        void setImageComment(java.lang.String comment,
                     org.json.JSONObject tags)
        Set the comment string for an individual image. The image is specified by indices given in tags.

      • getImageComment

        java.lang.String getImageComment(org.json.JSONObject tags)
        Returns the image comment for a particular image. The image is specified by indices given in tags.

      • storeChannelDisplaySettings

        void storeChannelDisplaySettings(int channelIndex,
                                 int min,
                                 int max,
                                 double gamma,
                                 int histMax,
                                 int displayMode)
        Store the display settings for a particular channel.
        Parameters:
        channelIndex - - The channel index for which settings are being specified
        min - - The minimum display intensity value (shown as black)
        max - - The maximum display intensity value (shown as full-intensity color)
        gamma - - The gamma value (curvature of the value-to-display curve)
        histMax - - The preferred maximum value at which the histogram is displayed.
        displayMode - - Composite, Color, or Gray-scale

      • getChannelSetting

        org.json.JSONObject getChannelSetting(int channel)
        Returns a JSONObject with channel settings for the channel whose index is the argument.

      • getBitDepth

        int getBitDepth()
        Returns the bit depth of all images in the image cache.

      • getDisplayMode

        int getDisplayMode()
        Returns the display mode used by the CompositeImage (composite, color, or grayscale)

      • getChannelColor

        java.awt.Color getChannelColor(int channelIndex)
        Returns the preferred display color for a channel, specified by channelIndex.

      • setChannelColor

        void setChannelColor(int channel,
                     int rgb)
        Sets the preferred display color for a channel
        Parameters:
        channel - - The channel index
        rgb - - A 6-byte integer specifying the color: e.g., 0xFFFFFF is white.

      • getChannelName

        java.lang.String getChannelName(int channelIndex)
        Returns the name of a channel specified by channelIndex.

      • getChannelMin

        int getChannelMin(int channelIndex)
        Gets the minimum intensity value for a channel display (typically shown as black).

      • getChannelMax

        int getChannelMax(int channelIndex)
        Gets the maximum intensity value for a channel display (typically shown as full intensity color).

      • getChannelGamma

        double getChannelGamma(int channelIndex)
        Returns the gamma for the channel display.

      • getChannelHistogramMax

        int getChannelHistogramMax(int channelIndex)
        Returns the preferred maximum value for the channel's histogram.

      • getNumDisplayChannels

        int getNumDisplayChannels()
        Returns the number of channels in the ImageCache. More channels may appear if more images are received with new channel indices.

      • getPixelType

        java.lang.String getPixelType()
        Returns the pixel type for images in this image cache.

      • getImage

        mmcorej.TaggedImage getImage(int channel,
                             int slice,
                             int frame,
                             int position)
        Return the TaggedImage at the specified coordinates, or null if that image does not exist.
        Specified by:
        getImage in interface TaggedImageStorage
